Sentencas: Introducing lattice strain at dissimilar interfaces has been considered as an efficient approach to enhance the ionic conductivity in thin electrolyte film of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces

Sentencas: However, quantitative analysis on depth profile of double strained crystal interfaces is still lacking.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces

Sentencas: In this report, the ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces is evaluated quantitatively.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces

Sentencas: The correlation between ionic conductivity enhancement and intrinsic parameters of double strained electrolyte materials (layer sequence, Young's modulus, Poisson's ratio) is investigated.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces

Sentencas: A prototype isotropic cubic lattice crystal (YSZ) is employed to verify our model.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces

Sentencas: The results show that the synergetic effects of double lattice strain on ionic conductivity are more prominent than that of the single lattice strain.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces

Sentencas: Our work provides insightful guidelines to enhance the ionic conductivity in electrolyte of SOFCs by introducing the double lattice strain at the nanoscale heterostructures.
Titulo: Ionic conductivity evolution of isotropic crystal with double strained interfaces
